title: URF
body: Is URF coming out tomorrow for us OCE people? If so, what time?

replies.body: Quick update for everyone, I've just realised that the ["Let's Celebrate 10 Years" Support Page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-) actually states that URF will release at 4pm on the 28th PDT, which should put it at about 10am AEDT tomorrow.
Is it not technically false advertising if they say it will come out on a specific day and it doesn't? Could they be sued/taken to court over it?

Nope. They stated "URF resumes on October 28th at 4:00 PM PDT". 
[Source](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-)

I've not seen anything regarding URF that's likely to be localised for OCE, and it's probably set up to release based on PDT (NA time). If it's consistent with the 10th anniversary missions, it *might* be available at about 7am on the 29th (AEDT), though whether that's when it *will* be available is uncertain (that would put it at 1pm PDT).

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=skmaMcEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-27T12:58:34.489+0000)
>
> I've not seen anything regarding URF that's likely to be localised for OCE, and it's probably set up to release based on PDT (NA time). If it's consistent with the 10th anniversary missions, it *might* be available at about 7am on the 29th (AEST), though whether that's when it *will* be available is uncertain (that would put it at 1pm PDT).

It's so annoying that Riot always keeps us in the dark on OCE.
ye ive been waiting since 1 am

> [{quoted}](name=Inspired Lunacy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=skmaMcEE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-27T22:17:40.589+0000)
>
> [REMOVED]

We just need to be patient with them, they're a small indie game company with a very small budget. Give them time.

Maybe we just won't be getting URF in OCE, we are kinda small, so if URF causes the server population to decrease, they might decide to try to preserve the server population and not release URF on smaller servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=skmaMcEE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-28T01:00:40.328+0000)
>
> Maybe we just won't be getting URF in OCE, we are kinda small, so if URF causes the server population to decrease, they might decide to try to preserve the server population and not release URF on smaller servers.

It only decreases because people come back for URF and then leave when it's over.
